content.speaker: rupak
content.context: Welcome to our show, everyone! Today, we have a couple of fantastic guests with us, Deepak and another expert who’ll join us shortly. Let’s dive into the world of digital marketing strategies and analytics! Deepak, why don’t you kick us off with a bit about yourself?

content.speaker: deepak

content.speaker: rupak
